mapper.select: select brand, apt_tb.name as "name", addr, lat, lng from apt_tb left join aptinfo_tb on apt_tb.id = aptinfo_tb.id
select id, name, addr, lat, lng from apt_tb
SELECT s.no, s.id, s.name, s.lat, s.lng FROM apt_tb s where s.addr like '%'||#{gu}||'%'
SELECT s.id, s.name, h.name, s.lat, s.lng FROM apt_tb s, apt_tb h where s.addr like '%'||#{gu}||'%' and h.id=0 and ST_DWithin(s.geom, h.geom, 100, false) order by s.name
select brand as "id", name, addr, lat, lng from apt_tb left join aptinfo_tb on apt_tb.id = aptinfo_tb.id where gu like '%'||#{gu}||'%'
